Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a red-brown pottery vessel, the interior is ribbed and covered with a dark-brown resinous deposit, the exterior is covered with a red-brown slip and remains of eight lines of black-painted text.
Curator's comments: Being studied for publication by Bryan Kraemer. Cemeteries and Osireion Excavations Group
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393803) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393803)
